amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the negotiation of agreements that permit foreign interests to fish within the 200-mile exclusive economic zones of the United States Pacific Insular Areas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to authorize the negotiation of agreements that permit foreign interests to fish within the 200-mile exclusive economic zones of the U.S. Pacific Insular Territories.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Underwood amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
